message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
